original_text: And thou shalt put the two wreathen chains of gold in the two rings which are on the ends of the breastplate.
korean_text: 땋은 두 금 사슬로 흉패 두 끝 두 고리에 꿰어 매고

sentences.original_text: And thou shalt put the two wreathen chains
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너는 두 갈고리 사슬을 놓을지니라

sentences.original_text: which are on the ends of the breastplate
